  • Constructor Details

    • BeforeUpgradeVersionCheck

      protected BeforeUpgradeVersionCheck(int minorVersionWhenTriggerIsApplicable)
      Parameters:
      minorVersionWhenTriggerIsApplicable - This is the minor version from the metadata.properties file or extensions.properties. Typically, one would bump the number by 1 in the file and use the new number here.

  • Method Details

    • getTable

      protected final IBeforeUpgradeReadOnlyTable getTable(String tableName)
      Overrides:
      getTable in class BeforeUpgradeVersionAction
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of a table. If this isn't the full name (i.e. with prefix), it is assumed to be a main table, i.e. the table prefix will be prepended to the given name. This parameter can contain the full name of a main table, or an extension table, or a typelist table or a staging table.
      Returns:
      An object that the caller can use to operate on tables

    • verifyUpgradability

      public abstract void verifyUpgradability()
      Verify preconditions on the schema and the data, before any transformations. Each version check is specific to that transformation and is provided by the person who is writing that version trigger.

      For example, if you are converting VARCHAR(50) to VARCHAR(20) during the upgrade, then you could verify that no values are longer than 20.

      Implementor will add an error message for each problem detected to the UpgraderContext via a call to addVersionCheckProblem(String)

    • addVersionCheckProblem

      protected static void addVersionCheckProblem(String message)
      Called to log any issues found by this version check.
      Parameters:
      message -
